com.vvs.training.hospital.daodb.impl

Class GenericDaoImpl<T extends com.vvs.training.hospital.datamodel.AbstractModel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vvs.training.hospital.daodb.impl.GenericDaoImpl<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vvs.training.hospital.daoapi.IGenericDao<T>

    public abstract class GenericDaoImpl<T extends com.vvs.training.hospital.datamodel.AbstractModel>
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.vvs.training.hospital.daoapi.IGenericDao<T>
    An GenricDao abstract class is made to simplify code and to make all simple CRUD operations, implements IGenericDao interface This class can't be instantiated, instead of that it should be extended by another class which represents an DTO object To make the GenericDao work you should specify the JdbcTemplate bean in springContext To make the GenericDao work you should specify the SimpleJdbcTemplate bean in springContext To make the GenericDao work you should specify the NamedParameterJdbcTemplate bean in springContext
    Author:
    Владислав
